TEXT.citation: Indigenous Languages Research and Development Foundation. (2020). 族語E樂園. https://web.klokah.tw/

S.FORM: lokah simu kwara’, t’ringa ta’ la.
lawkah simu kwara’, t’ringa ta’ la.
ttuliq kwara’! tatuk tunux!
lokah su’, sinsi.
lawkah su’, sinsi.
sinsi, lokah su’ ga.
sinsi, lawkah su’ ga.
tama’.
thzyuk.
lokah simu kwara’. kira’ ga, psbaqan simu ni sinsi maha nanu’ son na ’Tayal qu nniqun.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的泰雅語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say food in Thai.

S.FORM: lawkah simu kwara’. kira’ ga, psbaqan simu ni sinsi maha nanu’ sawn na ’Tayal qu nniqun.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的泰雅語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say food in Thai.

S.FORM: baqun su’ mung ke’ ni sinsi?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: baqun su’ mung kay’ ni sinsi?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: sinsi, ini’ maku’ baqi mung. kayal lozi minxal ku?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: sinsi, ini’ maku’ baqi mung. kazyal lawzi minxal ma’?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: ini’ maku’ pongi, pkrahu’ cikay hngzyang su’ ku?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: ini’ maku’ pawngi, pkrahu’ cikay hngzyang su’ ma’?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: ini’ maku’ pongi, pkhngzyang cikay ke’ su’ ku?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: ini’ maku’ pawngi, pkhngzyang cikay kay’ su’ ma’?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: kita’ sqani! glu kuzing lmpuw minxal.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡! 跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: baq su’ balay lmpuw.
blaq balay lnpuw su’.
lpuw lozi wah. pkhngzyang cikay.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: lpuw lawzi wah. pkhngzyang cikay.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: ’syang! laxi snqwaq.
agal biru’ mamu.
S.TRANSL: 請把你們的課本拿出來。

S.FORM: aw. sinsi.
agal inpit su’.
sinsi, zmungi’ saku’ maras inpit la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: agal ssom su’.
S.TRANSL: 請把你的橡皮擦拿出來。

S.FORM: agal ssawm su’.
S.TRANSL: 請把你的橡皮擦拿出來。

S.FORM: sinsi, zmungi’ saku’ maras ssom la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: sinsi, zmungi’ saku’ maras ssawm la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: ksyugi cikay qu ssom ni rugak ka cyux bih su’.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: ksyugi cikay qu ssawm ni rugak ka cyux bih su’.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: pksyugi saku’ ssom su’ ku?
pksyugi saku’ ssawm su’ ma’?
mhngawa ta’ cikay ha.
nway mucing sqani qu pinqbaqan ta’ soni’, mkta ta’ babaw rihay la.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
We’ll go up here and see you next week.

S.FORM: nway mucing sqani qu pinqbaqan ta’ sawni’, mkta ta’ babaw rihay la.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: ima’ su’?
ima’ qu lalu’ su’?
lalu’ maku’ ga, Maray.
ima’ su’?
kun ga, ’laqi’ ni Yukan. Maray lalu’ maku’.
S.TRANSL: I am Yukan’s son, and my name is Maray.

S.FORM: ima’ su’?
kun ga pinsbaqan ni Yukan. Maray lalu’ maku’.
S.TRANSL: I am a student of Yukan, my name is Maray.

S.FORM: ima’ qu lalu’ su’?
lalu’ maku’ ga, Maray.
ima’ qu lalu’ ni yaba’ su’?
lalu’ ni yaba’ maku’ ga, Yukan.
ima’ qu hya’?
hya’ ga, Tahus.
hya’ ga, qbsuzyan maku’. lalu’ nya’ ga, Takun.
S.TRANSL: He’s my brother, his name is Takun.

S.FORM: ima’ qu lalu’ nya’?
lalu’ nya’ ga, Tuyaw.
lalu’ nya’ ga, Yukan?
aw, lalu’ nya’ ga, Yukan.
Tuyaw lalu’ nya’ ga?
izyat. lalu’ nya’ ga, Tahus.
ima’ qasa hizya’?
hya’ ga, Binay. yata’ maku’.
ima’ qasa hizya’?
hya’ ga, rangi’ maku’, lalu’ nya’ ga, Amuy.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Amuy。
She’s my friend, her name is Amuy.

S.FORM: pira’ kawas su’ la?
mopu kawas maku’ la.
mawpu kawas maku’ la.
pira’ kawas nya’ la?
mopu sazing kawas nya’ la.
mawpu sazing kawas nya’ la.
pira’ kawas ni yaba’ su’ la?
mzimal kawas ni yaba’ maku’ la.
pira’ kwara’ mtswe’ su’?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: pira’ kwara’ mincgway’ su’?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: sazing qbsuzyan maku’, qutux sswe’ maku’.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: sazing qbsuzyan maku’, qutux ssgway’ maku’.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: kya qbsuzyan su’ mlikuy?
ungat qbsuzyan maku’ mlikuy.
pira’ hi’ kwara’ qutux su’ ngasal.
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: spayat hi’ kwara’ qutux maku’ ngasal.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: cyux su’ mqwas biru’ inu’?
cyux saku’ mqwas biru’ Bnka’.
ima’ qu hya’?
hya’ ga, mama’ maku’.
nanu’ cyux pcyuwagun ni mama’ su’?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: hya’ ga, kinsat.
ima’ qasa’ hizya’?
hya’ ga, qbsuzyan maku’ kneril.
hya’ ga, qbsuzyan maku’ knayril.
cyux mulu pcyuwagun qu qbsuzyan su’ kneril?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: cyux mulu pcyuwagun qu qbsuzyan su’ knayril?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: cyux mtzyuwaw byo’ing qu qbsuzyan maku’ kneril.
cyux mtzyuwaw byo’ing qu qbsuzyan maku’ knayril.
laha’ sazing hi’ ga, mtswe’?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: laha’ sazing hi’ ga, mincgway’?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: izyat. laha’ ga, msrangi’.
’tayal su’?
aw. kun ga, ’Tayal.
’tayal qu bes su’?
aw. hya’ ga, Saysyat.
wagiq yaba’ su’?
aw. wagiq sami kwara’ myan qutux ngasal.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: cyux mqwas biru’ sswe’ su’ kneril la?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: cyux mqwas biru’ saysgway’ su’ knayril la?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: aw. cyux mqwas biru’ la.
baq kmal ke’ na ’Tayal qu sswe’ su’?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: baq kmal kay’ na ’Tayal qu saysgway’ su’?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: aw ay. baq kmal kwara’ nha’.
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: aw ay. baq kmal kwara’ naha’.
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: pira’ kwara’ mtswe’ su’?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: pira’ kwara’ mincgway’ su’?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: cyugal kwara’ mtswe’ maku’.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: cyugal kwara’ mincgway’ maku’.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: cyux simu mgluw maki’ ki yaba’ yaya’ su’?
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: aw. mgluw sami maki’ ki yaba’ yaya’ maku’.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: cyux simu mgluw maki’ ki yutas yaki’ su’?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: ini’. ini’ sami’ pgluw maki’.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn’t live with them.

S.FORM: mgluw simu maki’ ki ima’?
mgluw sami maki’ ki yaba’, yaya’ ru qbsuzyan maku’ mlikuy.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: minkahul su’ inu’?
minkahul saku’ Cinsbu’.
cyux inu’ qu ngasal mamu?
cyux R’uzyan qu ngasal maku’.
cyux inu’ qu inkhulan su’?
inkhulan maku’ ga, cyux Slamaw.
cyux inu’ qu qalang mamu?
qalang myan ga, cyux Pyanan.
knwan ga, mosa’ su’ qalang su’?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: knwan ga, mawsa’ su’ qalang su’?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: hngawan ’bagan ga, mutux saku’ musa’.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: kun ga, ’laqi’ na ’Tayal.
hmswa’ kayal nya’ soni’?
hmswa’ kayal nya’ sawni’?
mhtuw wagi’ la, mkilux balay qu kayal.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it’s very hot.

S.FORM: ghzyaq te tanux?
ghzyaq tay tanux?
ghzyaq wah! kpzyux mlukus.
S.TRANSL: It’s cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: mkilux te tanux?
mkilux tay tanux?
ini’, sbehuy la, ini’ kkilux.
ini’, sbayhuy la, ini’ kkilux.
hmswa’ kayal soni’?
hmswa’ kayal sawni’?
ini’ kghzyaq ru ini’ kkilux kayal soni’, blaq qsliq.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It’s neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: ini’ kghzyaq ru ini’ kkilux kayal sawni’, blaq qsliq.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It’s neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: hmswa’ kayal nya’ gbyan soni?
hmswa’ kayal nya’ gbyan sawni’?
ungat yulung babaw kayal mhtuw bingah la.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: hmswa’ kayal te tanux?
hmswa’ kayal tay tanux?
mnisan mswat, smbu’ wagi’ la, kya hawngu’ utux la.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: mnisan mswat, smbu’ wagi’ la, kya hawngu’ ’lyutux la.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: hmswa’ kayal te ki simu?
hmswa’ kayal tay ki simu?
nyux sn’yal behuy nya’ te sami.
S.TRANSL: We’re going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: nyux sn’yal bayhuy nya’ tay sami.
S.TRANSL: We’re going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: blaq kayal te ki simu?
blaq kayal tay ki simu?
blaq ay, smbu’ wagi.
S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.

S.FORM: mosa’ saku’ mqwas biru’ la.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: mawsa’ saku’ gaku’ la.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: ghzyaq kayal, kpzyux cikay mlukus.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: mosa’ saku’ lki.
mawsa’ saku’ lki.
pqwalax hazi’ kira’, laxi zyungi’ maras ruku’.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It’s going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: pqwalax pi?
minsbisu soni’ si baqi sa pqwalax kira’.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it’s supposed to rain later.

S.FORM: minsbisu sawni’, si baqi sa pqwalax kira’.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it’s supposed to rain later.

S.FORM: mqwalax la?
minqwalax soni’ nyux mswat la.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it’s stopped.

S.FORM: minqwalax sawni’ nyux msiwat la.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it’s stopped.

S.FORM: mqwalax la?
hazi’ minqwalax la, nyux si khuzyaq qu tuqi.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: mqwalax pi? swa’ su’ nyux si qrqarus?
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: mqwalax ay. izyat saku’ minnaras ruku’.
S.TRANSL: 有下雨喔!我沒有帶雨傘。
It’s raining! I didn’t bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: lokah su’ ga?
lawkah su’ ga?
nyux su’ blaq ga?
sn’yal behuy, memaw nyux mxal tunux maku’ znyupan nya’!
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: sn’yal bayhuy, maymaw nyux mxal tunux maku’ znyupan nya’!
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: lokah su’ ga?
lawkah su’ ga?
nyux su’ blaq ga?
mkilux balay bnwan na wagi’ wah, memaw nyux mtkgil tunux maku’ la.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: mkilux balay bnwan na wagi’ wah, maymaw nyux mtkgil tunux maku’ la.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: zmungi’ saku’ maras inpit la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: zngayn maku’ maras inpit la.
pksyugay misu’.
zmungi’ saku’ maras qway la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: zngayn maku’ maras qway la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: ini’ saku’ aras uzi, hala ta’ mbazi.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either, let’s go buy one.

S.FORM: hala ta’ mbazi inpit ku?
S.TRANSL: Let’s go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: hala ta’ mbazi inpit ma’?
S.TRANSL: Let’s go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: aw, pbazi saku’ ssom uzi na’.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: aw, pbazi saku’ ssawm uzi na’.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: hala ta’ mbazi knmawn ku?
S.TRANSL: Let’s go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: hala ta’ mbazi knmawn ma’?
S.TRANSL: Let’s go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: izyat saku’ musa’. kinnama’ saku’ ngasal la.
S.TRANSL: 我不要去，我在家吃過了。
I don’t want to go, I’ve eaten at home.

S.FORM: zmungi’ saku’ hmlngaw sbil la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.

S.FORM: zngyan maku’ hmlngaw sbil maku’ la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.

S.FORM: ihi’ hali hmlngaw ru!
nhay hali hmlngaw ru!
zmungi’ saku’ cbil la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to pack a lunchbox.

S.FORM: zngayn maku’ maras sbil la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: nanu’ si ta’ kr’agi maniq sbil maku’ la!
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let’s eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: nanu’ kryaxun su’?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: pqaniq saku’ kryaxun na gaku’.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: nanu’ kryaxun su’?
S.TRANSL: What do you want to eat for lunch?

S.FORM: nyux saku’ maras sbil, nanu’ mglga ta’ kryax!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I’ve brought a lunchbox today, let’s eat together at noon!

S.FORM: hala ta’ tmucing lancyu ku?
S.TRANSL: Let’s go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: hala ta’ tmucing lancyu ma’?
S.TRANSL: Let’s go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: aw! cila.
hala ta tmucing pangcyu ku?
hala ta tmucing pangcyu ma’?
izyat saku’ musa’, pkita’ saku’ biru’.
ani saku’ magal kagaw ha.
S.TRANSL: Please help me with the broom.

S.FORM: aw. ni, nyux kagaw.
ani saku’ magal galiq ku?
S.TRANSL: Can you help me with the cloth?

S.FORM: ani saku’ magal galiq ma’?
S.TRANSL: Can you help me with the cloth?

S.FORM: nyux saku’ kmagaw, hali magal kusa Yumin.
S.TRANSL: I’m sweeping the floor, you ask Yumin to help you.

S.FORM: wal su’ suqun kmagaw la?
wal maku’ suqun kmagaw la.
swa’ su’ ini’ kagaw?
tmasuq saku’ kmagaw la.
m’uraw qu rhzyal, hali somi cikay ha.
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: m’uraw qu rhzyal, hali sawmi cikay ha.
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: aw, hala saku’ magal galiq.
aw, anay misu’ magal galiq.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go get the cloth for you.

S.FORM: m’uraw qu tubung qasa, hali somi cikay ha.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: m’uraw qu tubung qasa, hali sawmi cikay ha.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: ini’ na’ ha, nyux maku’ ini’ suqi kmagaw na’ qani.
S.TRANSL: 等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I’m not done sweeping here yet.

S.FORM: nanu’ pcyuwagun su’ kira’?
mosa’ saku’ hmkangi’ sinsi maku’.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to look for my teacher.

S.FORM: mawsa’ saku’ hmkangi’ sinsi maku’.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to look for my teacher.

S.FORM: nanu’ pcyuwagun su’ i tmasuq ta’ mqwas biru’ kira’ la?
S.TRANSL: 你今天放學後要做什麼?
What are you going to do after school today?

S.FORM: mawsa’ sami mglu mqwas ki rangi’ maku’.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to sing with my friends.

S.FORM: nanu’ pcyuwagun nya’ i tmasuq mqwas biru’ kira?
mosa’ mlngyaq.
mawsa’ mlngyaq.
nyux maki’ ngasal qu Tapas?
nyux ngasal ay. ’wah qsahuy ngasal.
S.TRANSL: She’s at home, please come in.

S.FORM: nyux maki’ ngasal qu Simuy?
nyux ini’ kaki’ ngasal. nanu’ zyuwaw su’ pi?
S.TRANSL: 她不在，請問你有什麼事?
She’s not here, what can I do for you?

S.FORM: ima’ sa?
yutas, kuzing ga Pepay. gyah cikay blihun ha ku?
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, this is Paypay, can you open the door please?

S.FORM: yutas, kuzing ga Paypay. gyah cikay blihun ha ma’?
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, this is Paypay, can you open the door please?

S.FORM: ima’ su’ pi?
kuzing ga, Kaynu’. mwah saku’ cisal isu’.
S.TRANSL: I’m Kaynu’ and I’ve come to talk to you.

S.FORM: bsyaq ta’ izyat minkita’ la.
aw rwa! s’nun misu’ balay la. ihi, ’wah aki’ ta’ mcisal ha!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快來，我們聊天吧!
Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let’s talk!

S.FORM: tama’ nbu qsya’ ha.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and drink water.

S.FORM: thzyuk. nbu qsya’ ha.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and drink water.

S.FORM: tama’. nbu ocya’ ha.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and have some tea.

S.FORM: thzyuk. nbu ocya’ ha.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and have some tea.

S.FORM: mhway su’.
nbu ocya’ ha.
talagay! blaq balay nbun ocya’ mamu!
mniqa ta’ cikay bway qhuniq ha.

S.FORM: ini’ kpzyux iyal baqun maku’, nway ru kya qu baqun maku’ ga, syukaw misu’.

S.FORM: pbazi saku’ kopu’. nyux simu mtbazi?
S.TRANSL: 我要買杯子，你們有賣嗎?
I want to buy a cup, do you sell them?

S.FORM: kya ay. pira’ bzirun su’?
S.TRANSL: Yes, how many do you want to buy?

S.FORM: nyux simu mtbazi binro?
ungat ay. ini’ sami ptbazi binro.
S.TRANSL: No, we don’t sell betel nut.

S.FORM: pbazi saku’ bwax.
pira’ sinbwan bzirun su’?
S.TRANSL: How many packs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: biqi saku’ cyugal sinbwan.
pbazi saku’ ngahi’.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: wal suqun mtbazi kwara’ qu ngahi hiya’/hizya’ la.
S.TRANSL: All the sweet potatoes are sold out.

S.FORM: wal naha’ bzirun kwara’ qu ngahi’ hiya’/hizya’ la.
S.TRANSL: All the sweet potatoes are bought out.

S.FORM: pbazi saku’ sazing yuyut thuzyu.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two bottles of oil.

S.FORM: qutux balay yuyut nyux msthay la.
S.TRANSL: We only have one bottle left.

S.FORM: hlani saku’ mbazi bazing ha.
pira’ tncin bzirun su’?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds do you want to buy?

S.FORM: pira’ tncin bazing bzirun su’?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds of eggs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: sazing tncin bzirun maku’.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two catties.

S.FORM: pbazi saku’ sazing bhul qinuw.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two green onions.

S.FORM: pbazi saku’ sazing bhul nigi’.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two green onions.

S.FORM: cyugal bhul nyux sqani, si misu’ bqan kwara’ la.
S.TRANSL: There are three left, all for you!

S.FORM: pira’ pila’ qutux sinbwan qani?
S.TRANSL: How much is this bag of rice?

S.FORM: qutux sinbwan ga, sazing kbhul.
qutux sinbwan ga, rusa’ kbhul.
mpusal qutux pila’ kwara’. nway mpusal pila’ sbiq su’.
mhway su’.
qani ga mqiru’ pgan pila’.
twangay maku’ mbazi cikay lozi, si ta’ pthki qutux kbhul pila’.
S.TRANSL: I’ll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: twangay maku’ mbazi cikay lawzi, si ta’ pthki qutux kbhul pila’.
S.TRANSL: I’ll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: kwara’ lga, zmagal kbhul ru mopu pila’.
kwara’ lga, zima’ kbhul ru mawpu pila’.
nway zmagal kbhul la, ku?
nway zima’ kbhul la, ma’?
lokah izyal qani hiya’ la, pkhunk cikay, ku.
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It’s too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: lawkah izyal qani hizya’ la, pkhunk cikay, ma’.
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It’s too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: hmit izyal qani hizya’ la, pkhunk cikay, ma’.
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It’s too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: izyat wah! mhnuk linpgan maku’ l’ay.
S.TRANSL: 不行，我算得很便宜了喔。

S.FORM: bziraw ta’ qutux sinbwan pyah qani.
S.TRANSL: I want this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: bziraw ta’ qutux sinbwan kahat qani.
S.TRANSL: I want this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: pyah qani ga, mtzyul pila’. kya na’ bzirun su’?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: kahat qani ga, mtzyul pila’. kya na’ bzirun su’?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: ksyuga ta’ cikay pila’ su’ ku?
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: ksyugay ta’ cikay pila’ su’ ma’?
aw’ ay. pira’ pila’ ksyugan su’?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How much do you need?

S.FORM: zmungi saku’ maras pila’ la, ksyugay ta’ cikay pila’ su’ hku?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: zmungi saku’ maras pila’ la, ksyugay ta’ cikay pila’ su’ hma’?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: zngyan maku’ maras pila’ la. ksyugay ta’ cikay pila’ su’ hku?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: zngyan maku’ maras pila’ la. ksyugay ta’ cikay pila’ su’ hma’?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: nyux saku’ ini’ sras ay!
S.TRANSL: I don’t have any money either!

S.FORM: zmungi saku’ maras pila’ la, ksyugay ta’ cikay pila’ su’ hkuhma’?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: zngyan maku’ maras pila’ la. ksyugay ta’ cikay pila’ su’ hku?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: zngyan maku’ maras pila’ la. ksyugay ta’ cikay pila’ su’ hma’?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: izyat wah. yalaw gi ini’ su’ pbzhan qu kinsyugan su’ sa minxal na’. yalaw gi
S.TRANSL: 不要，因為上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, because you haven’t paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: izyat wah. baha hmswa’ ini’ su’ pbzhan qu kinsyugan su’ sa minxal
S.TRANSL: 不要，因為上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, because you haven’t paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: ksyugay ta’ cikay lukus su’ ku?
ksyugay ta’ cikay lukus su’ ma’?
aw. agal nanak.
ksyugay ta’ cikay biru’ su’ hku?
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow your book, please?

S.FORM: wal maku’ spksyu Kiraw la.
ksyugay ta’ cikay zitensya’ su’ hku?
S.TRANSL: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?

S.FORM: aw. ana ga, pbzhan suxan ki.
S.TRANSL: Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

S.FORM: mqwalax la. nyux saku’ ini’ aras ruku’, pksyugi saku’ ruku’ su’ ku?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It’s raining, I don’t have an umbrella, can you lend me your umbrella?

S.FORM: qutux balay ruku’ maku’, si ta’ kr’agi ’mumuk la, ki.
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let’s stick together!

S.FORM: biru’ qani ga pinksyu su’ kuzing sa minxal, pbshanay misu’ la.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: teta’ biru’ nanu’ qu sozyan su’ mita’ ga, kayal saku’.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: tayta’ biru’ nanu’ qu sawzyan su’ mita’ ga, kayal saku’.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: knwan ga, pbzinhan misu’ kinsyugan maku’ pila’?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: nway. kya pila’ su’ lga, lnglung la.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It’s okay, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: knwan ga, pbzihan saku’ pila’ ka kinsyugan su’ la?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: pbzihay misu’ suxan.
S.TRANSL: I’ll return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: knwan ga, wahan su’ pbzih qu biru’ ka kinsyugan su’ la?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: aw misu’ wal sbiq shira’ lrwa?
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?
Didn’t I return it to you yesterday?

S.FORM: pinksyu isu’ ni Tasaw qu inpit qani?
S.TRANSL: Did Tasaw lend you this pen?

S.FORM: aw. kinsyugan maku’ ki hya’ soni’
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: aw. kinsyugan maku’ ki hya’ sawni’.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: kinsyugan su’ ki Tasaw qu inpit qani?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Tasaw?

S.FORM: izyat, qani ga, bnazi ni yaya’.
S.TRANSL: No, this is what mom bought.

S.FORM: ungat cimu’ la. usa’ ksyu cikay cimu’ ki Binay ha.
S.TRANSL: We are out of salt, go borrow some from Binay.

S.FORM: aw. hala saku’ ksyu.
hali kmal Pisuy maha biqi qu pila’ ka kinsyugan su’ la." kusa."
S.TRANSL: Go tell Pisuy to give me my money back.

S.FORM: pira’ pila’qu kinsyugan nya’?
S.TRANSL: How much does she owe you?

S.FORM: mosa’ su’ inu’?
mawsa’ su’ inu’?
mosa’ saku’ muhi’ ramat qmazyah.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: mawsa’ saku’ muhi’ ramat qmazyah.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: nanu’ cyux su’ pcyuwagun?
pzyux izyal k’man la, nyux saku’ smalit, pqsya’an maku’ kira’.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There’s too much grass, I’m cutting it, I’ll have to water it later.

S.FORM: ani saku’ magal cikay soki’ ru pkaruh hku?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: ani saku’ magal cikay sawki’ ru pkaruh hma’?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: cyux su’ syun inu’?
cyux maki’ sa bih na ’’amar.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: cyux maki’ sa bih na kalu’.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: cinbulan su’ uraw la?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: misan maku’ tnabul, ghapan maku’ kira’.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: mosa’ blaq klhun qu pinmuhi’ su’ ramat la?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: mawsa’ blaq klhun qu pinmuhi’ su’ ramat la?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: mosa’ blaq klhun qu tmana’ te runi hizya’ la. izyat baqun kmyut na’ qu sina’ ka cyux te hasa hizya’ na’.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: mawsa’ blaq klhun qu tmana’ tay runi hizya’ la. izyat baqun kmyut na’ qu sina’ ka cyux tay hasa hizya’ na’.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: talagay kinpzyux knihuy su’ ngahi’.
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: hali smku’ cikay sa khu’ ha, ku?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: hali smku’ cikay sa khu’ ha, ma’?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: nanu’ cyux mamu pcyuwagun?
nyux sami smi’ ami’ kkzyap qulih.
S.TRANSL: We’re releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: pzyux qulih nya’ sqani?
pzyux qulih cyux qrqan na sguzyu’ la.
S.TRANSL: 魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.

S.FORM: mutux su’ son nanu’ magal qu qulih?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: mutux su’ sawn nanu’ magal qu qulih?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: mutux maku’ si buy na panaq.
S.TRANSL: I shoot fish with a spear.

S.FORM: baq su’ tmqsinu na bhuniq?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: mutux maku’ ssi’ mrusa’ tmiriq qsinu, kruma’ ga mutux maku’ sbing patus ru s’aras huzil.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually catch my prey with a trap, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: qani ga, tuqi na bzyok qnhyun.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: qani ga, tuqi na bzyuwak qnhyun.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: swa’ su’ baqun?
qani ga, rapar na bzyok, nanu’ yasa qu baqun maha qani ga tuqi na bzyok la.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: qani ga, rapar na bzyuwak, nanu’ yasa qu baqun maha qani ga tuqi na bzyuwak la.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: ihi’ hali mita’ mrusa’ ta’, hazi’ cyux ciriq la.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

S.FORM: swa’ su’ baqun?
hazi cyux sokan na huzil la. ihi’ glgay ta’.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let’s follow them.

S.FORM: hazi cyux sawkan na huzil la. ihi’ glgay ta’.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let’s follow them.

S.FORM: nanu’ qu nyux su’ kblazyun?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: qani hizya’ ga, rangay, ’pux sa qoli’.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: qani hizya’ ga, rangay, ’pux sa qawli’.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: nanu’ qu cyux su’ bhngun sqasa hizya’?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: qasa hizya’ ga, mrusa’, tciriq myan para’.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: mhway yaba’ utux kayal, pzyux balay tniriq ta’ qsinu soni’.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: mhway yaba’ utux kayal, pzyux balay tniriq ta’ qsinu sawni’.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: balay! rasaw ta’ qalang ru halay ta’ minblaq mqasu ki glglu ta’.
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!
Yeah! Let’s take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: kira ga cbaqay simu mha nanu kmal ke Tayal qu qsinuw.
S.TRANSL: 今天要教大家動物的泰雅語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in Tayal language today.

S.FORM: kira qani ga cbaqay simu mha nanu kmal ke Tayal qu pinbahu.
S.TRANSL: 今天要教大家植物的泰雅族語怎麼說。

S.FORM: kira qani ga cbaqay simu na sinsiy mha muci nanu kmayal qu ke Tayal bway pinbahu.
S.TRANSL: 今天要教大家水果的泰雅語怎麼說。

S.FORM: laxi abi’.
laxi kal.
laxi qaniq nanu.
agal biru’ su.
agan inpit su.
agan binrwan su.
skuy biru su.
skuy inpit su.
skuy nniqun su.
skuy pzi’an su.
qani ga inpit ni ima?
rwa maku.
qani ga biru ni ima?
rwa watan.
qani ga ssom ni ima?
ini saku baqi.
qasa ga lukus ni Watan?
iyat! qani ga cintzyu’ ni Lawa.
sinsi, ini ku aras biru.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.

S.FORM: pgluw bes su pqqwas msqun mita.
S.TRANSL: Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: inpit mu ga nyux mpahu la.
ksyugi cikay gluw su pqqwas.
ani sbiru inpit gensi’.
ssom mu ga wan pzyaw la ssom maku ga wan mhotaw la’.
ksyugay misu ssom maku.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: masok mqbaq bbiru la, mblaq mita tuqi musa ngasan lki!
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: agu. mhway su sinsiy.
phngaw sami mqbaq la. sgagay ta kwara.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，大家再見。
The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: sinsiy sgagay ta la.
lokah ta kwara lalu mu ga Yukan.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Yukan.

S.FORM: Yukan lokah su.
lokah ta kwara, lalu maku ga Temu.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Temu.

S.FORM: Temu lokah su.
lokah su, kun ga Yukan.
Yukan lokah su, kun ga Watan.
lokah su, kun ga Losin.
Losin lokah su, kun ga Watan.
ima isu?
kun ga yaya ni Tana, kun ga Lawa.
ima isu?
kun ga sswe Rimuy knerin, lalu mu ga Pisuy.
S.TRANSL: 我是Rimuy的妹妹，我的名字是Pisuy。
I am rimuy’s sister. My name is pisuy.

S.FORM: ima qu hiya?
hiya ga sinsi, lalu nya ga Yumin.
ima qu squliq qasa?
hiya ga qbsuyan maku mlikuy, lalu nya ga Masin.
hiya ga Yukan pi?
aw, hiya ga Yukan.
isu ga Yukan pi?
iyat, kun ga Watan.
ima qu Yukan hiya.
kun qu Yukan hiya.
ima qu Watan hiya.
Watan ga rangi maku.
nanu qu lalu nya qbsuyan su kneril?
S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister’s name?

S.FORM: lalu nya qbsuyan mu knerin ga Tapas.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister’s name is Tapas.

S.FORM: nanu lalu nya sswe su knerin?
S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister’s name?

S.FORM: lalu ni sswe mu knerin ga Ciwas.
S.TRANSL: My younger sister’s name is Ciwas.

S.FORM: baqun su lalu nya pi?
Yukan qu lalu nya.
pira kawas nya qbsuyan su mlikuy kawas qani?
S.TRANSL: How old is your elder brother?

S.FORM: hiya ga mopuw zmagan kawas nya kawas qani.
pira kawas nya sswe su mlikuy kawas qani?
S.TRANSL: How old is your younger brother?

S.FORM: zmagan kawas nya kawas qani la.
maki pqwasan qalang mamu pi?
S.TRANSL: Do you have schools in your community?

S.FORM: maki.
cyux su mqwas biru pqwasan na qalang su ga?
S.TRANSL: 你在部落的學校讀書嗎?
Do you study in your tribe’s school?

S.FORM: aw, kwara sami nyux mqwas biru pqwasan ga yan qu qutux cinngasal.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: ima qu mlikuy qasa?
hiya ga mama maku.
ima qu knerin qasa?
hiya ga qbsuyan maku knerin.
ima qu ’laqi qasa?
hiya ga sswe maku knerin.
yaya su ga cyux mtzyuwaw nanu?
S.TRANSL: 你的媽媽從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: hiya ga hetay.
yaba su ga cyux mtzyuwaw nanu?
S.TRANSL: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: hiya ga sinsiy.
hiya ga sswe su mlikuy ga?
iyat! hiya ga rangi sswe mu mlikuy.
S.TRANSL: 不是， 他是我弟弟的朋友。
No, he is my younger brother’s friend.

S.FORM: hiya ga qbsuyan su knerin ga?
iyat! hiya ga sswe mu knerin.
S.TRANSL: 不是， 她是我的妹妹。
No, she is my younger sister.

S.FORM: lhga ga pira kwara squliq cingasan nha?
S.TRANSL: How many people in their family?

S.FORM: lha ga zmagan kwara squliq cingasan na.
S.TRANSL: There are five people in their family.

S.FORM: pira laqi cyux ngasal simu?
S.TRANSL: How many children in your family?

S.FORM: payat kwara llaqi myan.
S.TRANSL: There are four children in our family.

S.FORM: pira cyux qu sswe su mlikuy ki knerin?
S.TRANSL: How many younger siblings do you have?

S.FORM: ungat qu sswe mlikuy, cyux cyugan qu knerin hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我沒有弟弟，有三位妹妹。
I don’t have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.

S.FORM: pira cyux qu qbsuyan su mlikuy ki knerin?
S.TRANSL: How many older siblings do you have?

S.FORM: ungat qu qbsuyan mlikuy ki knerin mu.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have any older siblings.

S.FORM: pira kwara cyux mtswe su?
S.TRANSL: How many siblings do you have?

S.FORM: ungat qu mtswe maku.
simu ga mtswe ga?
hiya ga qbsuyan mu mlikuy.
simu ga yuencumin ga?
aw! sami ga squliq na Tayal.
hiya ga squliq na Tayal ga?
aw! hiya ga squliq na Tayal.
mha nanu qu kayal ryax soni?
hzyaq cikay hazi, qeri mnbuw qsya.
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點冷，要多喝熱水。
It’s a bit cold, so you need to drink more warm water.

S.FORM: hmswa kayal ryax soni?
mkilux hazi kayal, cingay mnbuw qsya.
S.TRANSL: It’s a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: hmswa kayal qu tanux ga?
hopa qu wagi, blaq mita kluxaw su na wagi.
S.TRANSL: The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

S.FORM: hmswa qu kayal na tanux ga?
cingay balay yulung kayal ga ungat wagi.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

S.FORM: mha nanu qu kayal na suxan?
suxan ga ungat wagi, yulung ga cingay balay.
S.TRANSL: 明天沒有太陽，雲很多，風很大。
It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.

S.FORM: ryax nxan qasa ga hmswa kayal?
S.TRANSL: How was the weather that day?

S.FORM: ryax qani ga hzyaq cikay, musa tanux ga plukus oba’.
S.TRANSL: 這天有點冷，出門要穿外套。
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.

S.FORM: ryax hngawan ga hmswa kayal?
S.TRANSL: How’s the weather on the weekend?

S.FORM: ryax hngawan qsliq qu kayal.
S.TRANSL: It will be sunny on the weekend.

S.FORM: ryax qasa ga mosa mqwalax ga?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: ryax qasa ga pkwagi kayal, iyat pqwalax.
S.TRANSL: 那天天氣晴朗，不會下雨。
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.

S.FORM: ryax qasa ga mosa mqwalax pi?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: aw! ryax qasa ga mosa mqwalax.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: nyux mqwalax pi?
mswat la, wagi cyux hmtuw la.
S.TRANSL: The rain stops and the sun comes out.

S.FORM: nyux mqwalax pi?
mqwalax la, ini saku aras ruku.
S.TRANSL: It is raining and I don’t have an umbrella with me.

S.FORM: cyux qwalax beh tanux ga?
misuw ga ini qwalax, babaw ska wagi lga musa qwalax la, musa tanux ga aras ruku.
S.TRANSL: 現在沒有下雨，中午過後會下雨，出門要帶傘。
It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.

S.FORM: qmisan kawas hnyan ga musa hzyaq balay ga?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very cold in winter next year?

S.FORM: aw, kawas hnyan ga musa hzyaq balay plukus cingay lukus.
S.TRANSL: 是，明年冬天會很冷，要穿很多衣服。
Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

S.FORM: kawas qani ga musa mkilux balay ga?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very hot in summer this year?

S.FORM: bagan ga musa mkilux balay, qeri mnbu qsya.
S.TRANSL: 是，夏天會很熱，要多喝水。
Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: smoya su ryax tmangu abaw ga?
smoya saku ryax na tmangu abaw. hrhul balay kayal.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡春天，天氣很溫暖。
I like spring because the weather is warm.

S.FORM: smoya su ryax huqan abaw ga?
ini saku soya ryax hoqan abaw, ryax hoqan abaw ga cingay msbehuy.
S.TRANSL: 我不喜歡秋天，秋天有好多颱風。
I don’t like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.

S.FORM: mungi saku maras bbiru la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the textbook.

S.FORM: gluw saku isu msqun mita.
S.TRANSL: I will share it with you.

S.FORM: mungi saku maras ssom.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the eraser.

S.FORM: ksyugay misu.
mungi su maras inpit pi?
S.TRANSL: Do you forget to bring your pen?

S.FORM: aw! ksyugay misu inpit ma?
S.TRANSL: Yes, can you lend me a pen?

S.FORM: nanu cyux su niqun kryaxan ga?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for lunch?

S.FORM: qaniq saku pang.
nanu qu niqun su kgabi?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for dinner?

S.FORM: qaniq ku mami.
wayan su klama la?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for breakfast?

S.FORM: mnaniq saku bazing la.
nanu wayan su niqun kryaxan?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: mnaniq saku ngta’ la.
musa sami pkmah mari.
usa lama, wahay misu kangi kira.
S.TRANSL: 你先去，我等一下去找你。
You go first and I will catch up later.

S.FORM: musa. sami mlngiq.
agu! pgluw ta musa.
musa sami mzuy mari.
iyat saku, musa sami lama hmakut bbiru.
S.TRANSL: No, we have to carry books first.

S.FORM: wan su kmugus g’nux la.
ini na, nyux saku qmwax pyatu’.
S.TRANSL: Not yet. I am doing the dishes.

S.FORM: wan su qmwax nqwaq la.
S.TRANSL: Did you rinse out your mouth?

S.FORM: qmwax saku nqwaq la.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.

S.FORM: wan su qmwax pyatu’ la.
wayan saku qwaxan pyatu’ la.
swa su ini qwaxi qba?
S.TRANSL: Why didn’t you wash your hands?

S.FORM: nagay cikay pqwax ku kira.
S.TRANSL: I will wash my hands later.

S.FORM: nanu cyux su pcyagun mwani?
S.TRANSL: What were you doing just now?

S.FORM: musa ku kangi sinsi.
S.TRANSL: I went to meet the teacher.

S.FORM: nanu pcyagun su masok pqwasan?
S.TRANSL: What are you going to do after school?

S.FORM: si saku usa ngasan la.
nanu pcyagun nya masok pqwasan.
S.TRANSL: What is she doing after school?

S.FORM: hiya ga musa myugi.
S.TRANSL: She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: Lawa, cyux su maki ngasal ga?
nyux, helaw gwah mzyup.
Lawa, cyux su maki ngsal ga?
ini kaki ngasal lawa ay! kun ga Ipay, maki nanu zywaw pi? kyalaw maku mwah Lawa.
S.TRANSL: Lawa不在家耶!我是Ipay，有什麼事嗎?回來我會轉告Lawa。
lawa is not at home. I am Ipay. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

S.FORM: ima simu ga?
yaki, sami ga Lawa ru Ciwas!
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我們是Lawa和Ciwas，幫我們開門!
Grandma, we are lawa and ciwas, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: ima sa ga?
kun ga Watan, nyux saku mwah kangi Temu.
S.TRANSL: I am watan, I am here for temu.

S.FORM: yaki nyux misu wahan mita la.
S.TRANSL: Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: bsiq balay ini su wah la, lungun misu balay.
S.TRANSL: 你好久沒來了，我好想念你。
You haven’t been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

S.FORM: Watan mwah saku mzuy isu la.
S.TRANSL: watan , I am here to play with you.

S.FORM: hay wah qsahuy, nyux misu ngon bsiq balay.
S.TRANSL: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: qani ga ngahi nuya saku, qaniq cikay!
S.TRANSL: 這是我種的地瓜，吃吃看!
This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!

S.FORM: sbing balay ngahi qani.
S.TRANSL: The sweet potato is so sweet.

S.FORM: wah! qani ga nuya maku bway, qani cikay.
S.TRANSL: 過來!這是我種的水果，吃看看。
Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

S.FORM: sbing balay bway qani.
tama cikay ha! qani ga nuya maku btasaw na qetun niqi cikay ktay!
S.TRANSL: 請坐! 這是我種的有機玉米吃看看!
Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.

S.FORM: oh! sbing balay qetun qani.
S.TRANSL: Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

S.FORM: isu ga qaniq su yutak ga?
kun ga ini saku qaniq yutak, maniq ku ring’go yasa la.
S.TRANSL: 我不能吃橘子，我吃蘋果就好。
I can’t eat oranges. I will have some apples instead.

S.FORM: qaniq su pyah ga?
aw, smoya saku balay.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I like it very much.

S.FORM: anay misu sqilis bway ru pniqay su.
S.TRANSL: Let me peel the fruit for you.

S.FORM: mhuway su, bway qani ga, cingay balay boq nya.
S.TRANSL: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.

S.FORM: s’agan misu qsya pnbun misu.
S.TRANSL: I will bring you some water.

S.FORM: mhuway.
cingay hazi maniq, cingay balay ramat hnapuy maku.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

S.FORM: uy! blaq balay sokan ru blaq niqun uzi.
S.TRANSL: 嗚! 真的很香也好吃。
Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.

S.FORM: cingay hazi maniq, nyux cingay hazi qani na.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.

S.FORM: iyat saku ksayux lay!
S.TRANSL: I’ll make myself at home then.

S.FORM: cingay cikay qaniq, nyux cingay balay qani na.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.

S.FORM: wan ku maniq cingay iyal la, iyat saku thoyay maniq lozi la.
S.TRANSL: 我吃了好多，不能再吃了。
I ate a lot and couldn’t eat any more.

S.FORM: sinsi rasay simu musa rgyax kira.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去山上。
I will take you to the mountains today.

S.FORM: kmal qu yaya mha cingay balay kuy na rgyax.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說山上有很多蚊子
Mom says that there are lots of mosquitoes in the mountains.

S.FORM: sinsi rasay musa qmayah kira.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去田裡。
I will take you to the fields.

S.FORM: musa sami qmibuw uraw ga?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to loosen the soil?

S.FORM: musa ta inu kira?
sinsi ga rasun ta nya syaw llyung.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the riverside.

S.FORM: musa ta inu kira?
sinsi ga rasun ta nya rgyax.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the mountains today.

S.FORM: musa ta bih syaw llyung kira pi?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the riverside today?

S.FORM: iyat, sinsi ga rasun ta nya rgyax.
S.TRANSL: 不是，老師要帶我們去山上。
No, our teacher is going to take us to the mountains.

S.FORM: musa ta rgyax kira pi?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the mountains today?

S.FORM: iyat musa ta slaq kira.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我們今天要去田裡。
No, we are going to the fields.

S.FORM: sinsi, nanu qu ’san ta mita syaw llyung?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到河邊要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see at the riverside?

S.FORM: rasay simu mita klosan.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: sinsi, musa ta mita nanu qu rgyax?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到山上要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see in the mountains?

S.FORM: musa ta mita kperay.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see butterflies.

S.FORM: musa ta hmswa beh slaq?
S.TRANSL: What are we going to do in the fields?

S.FORM: musa mita nuya ta qetun bih slaq, pinbaq cikay maki qtahi ru hzing ay!
S.TRANSL: 我們要到田裡看我們種的玉米，要小心有螞蟻、蜜蜂唷!
We are going to see the corn we grow in the fields, but you need to be aware of the ants and bees.

S.FORM: sinsi, musa ta mlngiq llyung ga?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到河邊游泳嗎?
Teacher, are we going to swim in the river?

S.FORM: iyat, musa ta mita klosan.
S.TRANSL: No, we are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: sinsi musa ta muya ramat bih slaq ga?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到田裡種菜嗎?
Teacher, are we going to grow some vegetables in the fields?

S.FORM: musa ta tmaroq uraw kira.
S.TRANSL: We are going to loosen the soil today.

S.FORM: sqasa ga klosan cyux msbzih mlaka kya.
tehuk soni wal saku balay ktan mqyanux na klosan.
S.TRANSL: 我今天才看過真正活著的蜻蜓。
Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

S.FORM: sqasa ga cyux msbzih mlaka kya qu kperay.
ye! ye! smoya saku kperay bintunux balay.
S.TRANSL: 耶!哇!我喜歡蝴蝶，很漂亮。
Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.

S.FORM: sqasa ga cyux msbzih mlaka kya kperay.
qasa ga iyat kperay, qasa ga hzing.
S.TRANSL: Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

S.FORM: si kita sqani, laxi usa twahiq iyal ki!
S.TRANSL: 在這裡看一看，不要到太遠的地方唷!
Come here and take a look. Don’t go too far!

S.FORM: aw, iyat sami musa stwahiq iyal.
S.TRANSL: 好，我們不會去太遠的地方。
Got it, we won’t go anywhere too far.

S.FORM: laxi qinah ksuqiy hkangi nway su ini ptakuy.
S.TRANSL: 不要用跑的，慢慢走免得跌倒了。
Don’t run and walk slowly lest you fall down.

S.FORM: mnglung saku, helaw hazi mita.
S.TRANSL: I want to see them right away.

S.FORM: muci su nanu musa tatak?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to the block-house?

S.FORM: qmuzyut saku glgan musa tatak.
mha nanu musa byo’ing qu hiya?
S.TRANSL: How does he go to the hospital?

S.FORM: hkangi musa byo’ing qu hiya.
mha su nanu musa phongxu?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: gluw saku kululaka musa.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by plane.

S.FORM: muci su nanu musa phongxu?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: gluw saku qasu musa phongxu.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by boat.

S.FORM: mgluw su nanu musa ngasal?
lgluw saku ceyun musa ngasal.
Lawa ga wal mluw glgan musa pqwasan?
S.TRANSL: How does lawa go to school?

S.FORM: Lawa ga wal mluw kisya musa pqwasan.
S.TRANSL: lawa goes to school by train.

S.FORM: Sayun ga wal mluw nanu musa kyokay?
S.TRANSL: How does Sayun go to church?

S.FORM: Watan ga wal mluw zitensya musa kyokay.
S.TRANSL: watan goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: isu ga mluw su ceyun musa pqwasan?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: kun ga mluw saku basu.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: isu ga mluw zitensya musa pqwasan ga?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: aw, mluw saku zitensya musa pqwasan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: mluw su Ceyun musa takaw?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: mluw saku kawthe musa Takaw.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: musa su tayto ga mluw su kisya ini ga mluw kululaka ga?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: mluw ku kululaka, mluw kululaka ru mluw kisya ga helaw qu kululaka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: musa su kyokay ga tama su basu ini ga qmuzit su glgan ga?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: qmuzit saku glgan ga helaw hazi qu tama basu hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: sobeh ngasal su bbiran qqaya?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: ini sobeh mtama saku otobay musa bbiran qqaya.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: sobeh yubinkyok qu pqwasan ga?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: sobeh balay hkangi kakay lga tehok la.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: nniqan nniqun ga sobeh ngan basu?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: htu ngan basu ru hkangi zmagan spung lga tehuk la.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: isu ga maki zyuwaw su soni?
hmswa pi?
smoya ku mwah mkal isu.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: kya zyuwaw maku soni ini ku kaki ngasal. babaw nya ma.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家。改天吧。
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: yasa suxan maki zyuwaw su pi? musa ku kangi isu babaw ska wagi.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: aw ga, kaki ku ngasan n_gay misu.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: pqutay misu cikay baqun ru_ing ga aki maku brwan.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: agu! ungat nanu zyuwaw.
baqun magan mngayan ga?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: yaqih saku ktan nyux ku ini smzyut qhu’ na ay.
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: yasa ga psyasin saku nanaq.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: laxi psyasin uzi.
mhway su smwan su wahan mkal.
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: ungat zywaw qmhut, nanu qu pqutnu su?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: pqutay misu nanu qu pincwagan su mrkyas?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: galan saku kinsat nyux ku hngaw misu qani la.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: yasa ga nyux su mtzyuwaw na?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: nyux ku mtzywaw beh pqwasan.
pqutay misu, cyux maki qalang laqi su uzi ga?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: iyat, cyux maki hogan laqi mu.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: yasa ga isu nanaq qutux hi’ nyux maki ga?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: nyux saku qmayat qutux huzil ru qutux qhniq lozi, lha ga cingasan maku.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: nyux saku qmayat ngyaw uzi, maki qnyatan smbes ini saku pkilang la.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: aki misu pqutan cikay, zyuwaw na psaniq pqalup.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: ini saku baqi piyux zywaw, kya baqun mu ga ssyukun misu kmal kwara.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: simu qu musa ptqalup ga maki nanu psaniq nya?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: musa sami qmalup ga ini swali kneril tmring qqaya pqalup.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: yasa ga thoyay musa mgluw qmalup qu kneril pi?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: ini ay kneril hiya ga ini swali ptqalup.
S.TRANSL: No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Watan, ungat qwaw trakis ngasal la, isu usa maziy qwaw trakis.
S.TRANSL: Watan，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
watan, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: kinzyaw ga maki qutux yuyut, laxi baziy la!
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧!
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: qutux yuyut ini tnaq, usa maziy sazing yuyut lozi.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: baziy saku qwaw trakis, nyux simu tbaziy ga?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: maki ay! pira baziy su?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: baziy saku sazing yuyut ru qutux ssabu bwax.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: nyux sqani bwax nanu baziy su lozi ga?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: baziy saku bazing maki simu ga?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: wal suqun tbaziy bazing myan la.
baziy saku lukus.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: nanu llamu na szyon su ga?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: baziy saku r’tung quzit na lukus.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: mtalah qani ga mha nanu?
maki ptasan binah pi?
maki plquy ru msryaw sami na.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: biqi saku qutux msryaw na lukus.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Watan mwah su inu soni la mnwah su slokah hi’ su ga?
S.TRANSL: Watan你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
watan, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: iyat! mnwah saku rmaw yaki tbaziy ramat.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: mha kya ga, maki zywaw su gbyan smoya’ su mgluw kun kgabi ga.
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊，你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯。
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: ungat ay! musa saku maziy lukus.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: yasa ga msqun ta mgluw musa.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: lokah su, pqutay misu cikay pira pila qutux qaxan ramat qani?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: mpusal pila qutux taba ramat.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: pira pila qu ngahi qani?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: qutux tncin ngahi ga mtzyun pila.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: biqiy saku cikay sazing taba’ ramat ru qutux tncin ngahi.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: watan mungi saku maras inpit la baqun su ksyuw inpit cikay ma?
S.TRANSL: Watan，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
watan, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: ungat rwa maku uzi la qutux ga rwa Lawa hiya qani.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is Lawa’s.

S.FORM: yasa qu ksyugay maku cikay ma? helaw ku pbbiq isu lozi.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: agu, agan.
mhuway su, biqiy hnway maku Lawa uzi.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank lawa for me.

S.FORM: kya nanu szyon su na?
bzihiy saku miq sazing biru qani.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: kya nanu szyon su na?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: ksyugun mu cyugan bbiru qani lozi.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: aw la. laxi zngi wahiy sbzih miq babaw cyugan ryax lozi.
S.TRANSL: 好了。記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: ini saku bzihan miq ssom na ki.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: wal maku bzihan miq hera la.
yasa ga swa ini ’luy ssom mu la.
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: isu ga ini su wan ksyugan Watan la.
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to watan?

S.FORM: ini maku baqiy ’say mu maqut hiya.
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: ksyugay misu ssom maku ha.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Sayun, lukusoba’ qani ga kinsyugan su nya Watan ga?
S.TRANSL: Sayun, did watan lend you this coat?

S.FORM: iyat qani bnaziy ni yaya mu.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: lukusoba’ na Watan ga mtnaq rwa su.
S.TRANSL: watan’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: lukusoba’ nya ga mqalux, ini ptnaq qu ptasan ta.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Sayun su ksyugun pila Watan pi?
S.TRANSL: Sayun, did you borrow money from watan?

S.FORM: agu, aki maku sbiq pila kinsyugan soni, mungi saku maras pila la.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: yasa ga knwan qu sbiq su?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: suxan ga sbiq maku pila kinsyugan maku hiya.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: aw, pragay misu kmayan Watan.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell watan for you.

S.FORM: qoli ga aki ta skahul rangay kmzyap, kugih ga aki ta skahul ta tlnga’ kmzyap.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: ubaq su mha qani nyux saku mn’uqu la.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: yasa ga cbqay su mha nanu kbalay sazing tuqi na tlnga’ lozi.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: aw ga! talagay blaq! muci qani lga musa saku kyapun qsinuw la.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: qroyux iyal k’man na slaq la, usa magan soki beh khu’, musa ta slaq.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: cyux syan inu qu soki?
cyux syaw na yawa mzyup su khu’ lga ktan su la.
S.TRANSL: 在圓簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: pn_gabaq magan, laxi agan qilis, hmnyut balay soki.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿，不要受傷。鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: laxi qpliy rusa maku!
cyux inu qu rusa su?
cyux maki kyahu qhoniq qasa qu rusa mu.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: swa su ini zngi ga?
cyux maku syan tamas sqani, bqqun mu cyux inu qu rusa mu.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: qani ga skuyu’, syan myan syaw gong kzyap qulih.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: sami sqasa hiya ga ungat skuyu’ myan, sami ga pnep myan kmzyat qulih.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: wan ku ini pnep knan, hnyan qani ga pcbaqi saku ma?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: aw ga! msqun ta musa pnep babaw nya.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: yasa ga cbaqay misu kbalay skuyu’.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: cyux mzuy boyaw su la aw ini maki qulih krongan la! isu ga helaw hazi skluw la.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: naga mzuy iyal qu qasu la. nyux saku skluw boyaw sqani, usa rmaw kun magan tara’ sqasa.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: skluw qulih wah kun sqani. ’ragay misu skluw.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊。我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: talagay blaq la! soni ga hbuyaw ta balay, nyux s’unan quliq skuyu’ la.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: helaw ta hazi musa ru say ta pqaniq kwara.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: ’nyal sinsi la.
laxi h_yapas la, nhay usa’ tama’ sa thekan su’.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: swali’ saku’, nyux saku’ mqsuqi’ la!
nhay kzyup te qsahuy!
soni’ ga te pira’ ryax nqu rehay la?
te zmagal ryax na babaw rehay, phangaw ta’ suxan, hala ta’ hm_yapas te tanux ma’?
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧?
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: aw ga! hata’ hm_yapas syaw gong.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.

S.FORM: suxan ga te pira’ ryax na babaw rehay la?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: suxan ga te cyugal ryax na babaw rehay, hata’ mzyuy mari babaw kinryax suxan!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: nanu’ pcyuwagun su’ sasan suxan?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: suxan ga hngawan ryax, sami ki yaya’ mu ga musa’ sami kyokay.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: nyux su’ hmswa’ la?
nyux saku’ aki’ mkmutaq, musa’ saku’ psqcyan.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: nyux mtkgil iyal qu tunux mu.
psromux hngaw ha’.
sinsi, nyux mxal ktu’ maku’, musa’ saku’ psqcyan.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: aw, nhay usa’.
haku’ mima’ qba’ hma’?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: sobih ta’ ptmasuq mqbaq la, lawa’ cikay ru usa’.la.
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: sinsi, nyux mxal balay tunux maku’, aki’ saku’ mhngaw babaw kinryax.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: aw, inblaq musa’ ngasal ki.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: sinsi, phngaw saku’ te qutux ryax na rehay ’nyal, mosa’ saku’ pkita’ sinsi phgup.
S.TRANSL: 老師我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: aw, inblaq mlahang hi’ su’.
cyux inu’ Binay?
cyux mxal ktu’ nya’, cyux sa psqcyan.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: cyux inu’ Silan?
sinsi, cyux mxal btakan nya’, phngaw kira’.
S.TRANSL: 老師，他喉嚨痛，今天請假。
Teacher, he has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: swa’ ini’ ’wah qu Binay?
cyux mkilux lozi qu tunux nya’.
ima’ qu isu’ wah?
kuzing ga Yumin Batu’, mopuw kawas maku’ misuw qani.
S.TRANSL: My name is Yumin Batu’, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: ima’ lalu’ su’?
Yumin Batu’ lalu’ mu.
’tayal su’ inu’ wah?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: ’laqi’ saku’ na ’Tayal.
’tayal kwara’ qu ngasal mamu?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: aw, ’Tayal kwara’ sami qutux ngasal.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是泰雅族人。
Yes, my whole family is Atayal.

S.FORM: ’tayal simu kwara’ qutux su ngasal?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: iyat, yaba’ maku’ ga ’Tayal, yaya’ maku’ ga plmukan.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是泰雅族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Atayal, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: ’laqi’ su’ ni ima?
’laqi’ saku’ ni Silan Nawi.
qasa ga yaba’ su’? pira’ kawas nya’ la?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: mtzyu’ pgan kawas nya’ la.
qasa’ ga yaba’ su’? pira’ kawas nya’ la?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: iyat, hya ga mrhuw na qalang myan, mspat pgan kawas nya’ la.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: pira’ kawas nya’ qbsuzyan su’?
mopuw spat kawas nya’ qu qbsuzyan mu la.
mstwahiq zyuwaw na kawas mamu ki qbsuzyan su’?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: zmagal kawas qu zyuwaw myan.
ktwa’ kinwagiq su’?
kbhul ru mspatul inci.
bsyaq ta’ iyat minkita’ la, wal tmwang kinwagiq su’ lrwa?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: aw la, kbhul ru mtzyul inci kinwagiq maku’ la.
wal su qthuy lrwa?
ini’ ay, nyux mtkari knita’ su’ la.
wal su’ mhikang la?
ini’, nyux saku’ qthuy la.
wal su qthuy la?
aw, misuw qani ga mtzyul kunking la.
musa’ su’ inu’?
musa’ saku’ hmkangi’ sinsi squ bbrwan.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: musa’ inu’ qu Losing?
musa’ muling syup qu Losing.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: cyux inu’ qu Tali’?
cyux te lubung lngyaqan, musa’ mspung mlngyaq kira’ qu Tali’.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: cyux inu’ qu Ciwas? mmosa’ mspung mqzinah kira’ la.
S.TRANSL: Ciwas在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Ciwas? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: cyux sa krahu’ na pslyan, halay maku’ mlawa’.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: mglga ta’ musa’ pqnahan.
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: haku’ mbaziy kryaxun maku’ ha’, ’say misu’ hmkngi’ kira’.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: hata’ hmakut cbil ta’ ha!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: usa’ hmkangi’ squliq, mosa’ saku’ hmkangi’ sinsi.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: Yumin pspung ta’ mari’ ka tcingun kira’?
S.TRANSL: Is Kacaw competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: iyat ay, mosa’ mspung mtazil ay!
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: ryax na unrokay ga, mosa’ su’ mspung nanu’?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天，你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: aw ay, mosa’ saku’ mspung mqzinah.
ryax na unrokay ga, mosa’ su’ mspung nanu’?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天，你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: mosa’ saku’ mspung squ mari’ tcingun.
nanu’ qu ppcyuwagun ta’ ryax na unrokay?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: mosa’ ta’ mspung mhhuluy snyu.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: ptbaziy ta’ nniqun sa ryax na unrokay?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: iyat, ptbaziy ta’ bubul.
nyux su’ magal icibang la, ta’ kinlokah su’!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: mhway su’.
cyux maki’ ngasal yaki’ su’?
aw, cyux m’abi sa qsahuy.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: cyux maki’ ngasal yaki’ su’ ?
ini’ kaki’ ngasal, misan wal tanux, mwah ngasal gbyan.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: cyux maki’ ngasal yutas su’?
cyux te sazing ’rkan, hali’ hmkangi’ kya.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: kya’ ’tayal nyux ngasal?
Temu, bsyaq misu’ iyat kintan la, lokah su’ ga?
S.TRANSL: 是Temu阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Temu. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: lokah saku’ ay, nyux saku’ mwah cisal isu’.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: cyux inu’ yaba’ su’?
cyux tmahuk ramat te phpuyan, ’say maku’ mlawa’!
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: wal inu’ qu Pepay la?
wal kmzyap ngta’ sa libu’ ngta’.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: yutas, nyux sami la.
ini’ kaki’ ngasal qu yutas mamu, cyux qmayah, ’si’ n_ga kya ngasal..
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: mama’, nyux su’ lga.
bsyaq misu’ iyat kintan la, nyux su’ wagiq la.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: mqas saku’ balay mita’ isu’.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: bniq maku simu qu pngran qani, hali smi’ sa tenpingsyang.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: bsyaq iyat su’ minnwah la, plwanay maku’ kwara’ mtswe su’ ha, aki’ mwah mplaw maniq.
S.TRANSL: 你這麼久沒來，我叫你的兄弟都來一起吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: laxi’ lnglung nanu’ la, si ta’ nbu ocya’, hala ta’ mcisal te tangha’.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: blaq balay qu innaga’ su’, hala saku’ la.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: misan tnahuk qu ngta’ qani, aras isu’, hali’ thhway maniq ngasal.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: aki ta’ mkita’ babaw kinryax suxan ma’, smwayal su’?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: aw, pkita’ ta’ inu’ pi?
nanu’ mkta’ ta’ sa pqwasan biru’ ma? psyasing ta’.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: nanu’ hata’ squ pslyan na ’tayal, plukus saku’ lukus na ’Tayal.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: m’phpah qu lapaw na qalang myan ga blaq balay ktan, mha ni m’phpah lga ’wah mcisal qalang myan la!
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: siki tehuk qu tngawan abaw, iyat hazi’ pnaga kya’ la!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: nanu’ ’wah squ pslkotas mayn la!
S.TRANSL: 那你感恩祭的時候來吧!
Then come during our Thanksgiving Festival!

S.FORM: aw ga! pnaga’ saku’ balay ay!
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: swa’ su’ mbzinah musa’ maki’ qalang rgyax lozi?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: musa’ saku’ pcbaq biru’ lelaqi’ na pqwasan biru’ qalang myan.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: swa’ su’ ini’ pcbaq biru’ te hugal pi?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: baha hmswa’ ga sm’inu’ saku’ qalang maku’, ru aki’ maku’ ’benahun miq qalang maku’ qu pinqbaqan maku’.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: baq su’ balay tminun, ima’ pincbaq isu’?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: yaki’ maku’, hya’ ga spzyang balay baq tminun nqu qalang myan.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: swa’ su’ lmnglung mha pqbaqay ta’ qu tminun?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: tminun hiya’ ga gaga’ nqu qnxan ta’ nanak, aki’ saku’ nyux ’mubuy squ gaga’ na qnxan ta’.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: talagay kinblaq nbun qu qwaw trakis qani!
kinbalay maku’ nanak ay!
baq su’ balay wah! bsyaq la? sni’ su qwaw qani?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: ini’ kbsyaq, ki’a hazi smka’ byacing lga blaq la. psklwan ta’ rhkil ini’ ga trakis ru shzi’ sa bluku’ ru mbasaw lga s’imaw na tamul ru, mukan na abaw bgazyaw, mktzyu’ lga tkron sa salaw la.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約兩週就好，先把糯米或小米蒸熟倒入圓型盛器晾乾，並放入酵母菌用姑婆芋蓋住，三天後就裝入甕裡密封。

No, It takes about two weeks. to steam the glutinous rice or millet and pour it into a round container to dry, then put in the yeast and cover it with a giant taro, then put it into an urn and seal it after three days.

S.FORM: nanu’ qu nyux su’ stbazi?
kya qu lacyaw ru qinuw, pinmuhi’ maku’ nanak ay!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: pira’ pila’ kwara’ qu sazing qani?
kwara’ ga rusa kbhul ru mzimal pila’.
lukus qani qu szyon maku’, pira’ pila’ wah?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: qani ga zima’ kbhul.
hmit ’yal la, pkhway cikay ma’?
S.TRANSL: It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: ungat qbaqan, skhway maku’ cikay lga, pshutaw saku’ la.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: aw pi! nanu’ lukus mqalux qasa qu bziraw maku’.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: hocyo qani ru kluban qani qu galun maku’.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把菜刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: sazing seng kwara’, kinnalay maku’ na qba’ nanak, mosa’ su’ bsyaq balay bengun..
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: kyalaw maku’ rngrangi’ maku’ mha ’wah mbazi sqani, ru pkhway cikay lma’!
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: aw, nanu’ hyu’aw ta’ mpusal pasento.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’ll give you a 20% discount.

S.FORM: wahi mita’ cikay! ana lukus ru qbubu’ ga nyux kwara’.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: pira’ pila’ qu lukus hiya?
qutux lukus ga cyugal kbhul ru mzimal, cyugal lukus lga qutux seng la.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: nanak yaqani qu bzirun maku’, biqi saku’ sa giqas.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: lokah su’ ga, smoya’ saku’ qutux snbwal na rhkil mami’ ru syam maqaw.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: wal nha suqun mbazi la. nyux na’ qu rhkil na tana’, pbazi su’?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: aw pi, nanu’ biqi saku’ qutux, mm’wah saku’ mbazi mami’ lozi babaw nya’.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: aw, anay misu’ smabu’ ru tkraw maku’ sa yubing. mzimal pila’.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
